mapper.select: select menu_no, menu_name, menu_price, menu_content, menu_category, menu_img, menu_regdate, store_id from menu where store_id = #{store_id} order by menu_no desc
mapper.insert: insert into menu(menu_no, menu_name, menu_price, menu_content, menu_category, menu_img, store_id ) values(menu_seq.nextval, #{menu_name}, #{menu_price}, #{menu_content}, #{menu_category}, #{menu_img}, #{store_id})
mapper.update: /* Menu - menuUpdate */ UPDATE menu SET menu_category = #{menu_category}, menu_name = #{menu_name}, menu_price = #{menu_price}, menu_content = #{menu_content}, menu_img = #{menu_img}, menu_regdate = sysdate WHERE menu_no = #{menu_no}
